alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Beaver and northwestern Iron Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 27 miles east of Ranch Campground, or 28 miles east of Ursine. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Beaver and northwestern Iron Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
